function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation due to lack of health measures","Impact":"Spread of diseases affecting large population segments","Mitigation":"Implementation of health and safety measures, vaccination programs, and hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, sanitation technology, contactless technology","People":"General public, employees, stakeholders","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, employers"},{"Description":"Increased social issues leading to disparities and malnutrition","Impact":"Health and well-being disparities among population segments","Mitigation":"Improving equity in accessibility, availability, and affordability of goods and services, promoting inclusion and awareness","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying disparities, supply chain management systems, social impact measurement tools","People":"Underprivileged populations, marginalized groups, vulnerable communities","Owner":"Social organizations, non-profit organizations, corporations"},{"Description":"Environmental impact leading to resource depletion and waste generation","Impact":"Adverse effects on ecosystems and natural resources","Mitigation":"Adoption of sustainable practices, waste reduction strategies, conservation efforts","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, waste management technologies, environmental monitoring systems","People":"Ecosystems, wildlife, local communities","Owner":"Environmental agencies, conservation groups, corporations"}]}
